name: Tambola Time
description:
Tambola Time is an app that is used to generate numbers between one and ninety. Any player can be the "caller" using the Tambola Time app. As the numbers are selected by Tambola Time, players mark off that number on their scorecards. As each number is selected by Tambola Time, it is also displayed on the board for verification purposes or to confirm an actual winner when Tambola is called by a player.

Tambola Time is a fun game to play with friends and family. Good luck and enjoy.
